condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :FA - Schedule 2, Section I.A.1 | Description :The Recipient: (a) through the Secretary of the Ministry of Energyshall oversee the implementation of Part 2 of the Project; and (b) through Investment Board of Nepal shall be responsible forimplementing Part 3 of the Project.

Finance Agreement :FA - Schedule 2, Section I.B.1(a) | Description :To facilitate the carrying out of Part 1 of the Project, theRecipient shall make the proceeds of the financing allocated to Category 1 to Hydroelectricity Investment and Development CompanyLimited (HIDCL) under a subsidiary agreement between the Recipient and HIDCL.

Finance Agreement :FA - Schedule 2, Section I.B.1(b) | Description :To facilitate the carrying out of Part 1 of the Project, theRecipient shall cause HIDCL to further on-lend proceeds referred to in paragraph 2 above to Kabeli Energy Limited (KEL) under asubsidiary agreement between HIDCL and KEL as a subordinated loan agreement.

Finance Agreement :FA - Schedule 2, Section I.D.1 | Description :The Recipient shall, and shall cause the Project ImplementingEntity (KEL) to carry out the Project in accordance with the provisions of the Safeguards Instruments and those of the Governanceand Accountability Action Plan (GAAP).

Finance Agreement :FA - Schedule 2, Section I.D.3 | Description :The Recipient shall ensure or cause to be ensured that terms ofreferences of any consultants' services shall duly incorporate applicable international standards equivalent to the World BankSafeguards Policies.

Finance Agreement :PA - Section D.1.C | Description :KEL shall carry out Part 1 of the Project in accordance with the provisions ofthe Environmental Impact Assessment, the Social Action Plan and the Dam Safety Plan.
Finance Agreement :PA - Section E.1(a) | Description :KEL shall, prior to commencing civil works under Part 1 of the Project,obtain a power generation license from the Recipient.

Finance Agreement :PA - Section E.1(b) | Description :KEL shall, by no later than May 31, 2014, enter into a power purchaseagreement with Nepal Electricity Authority in form and substance satisfactory to the Association.

Finance Agreement :PA - Section E.1(d) | Description :KEL shall, by no later than April 30, 2014, engage consultants havingqualifications and terms of reference acceptable to the Association to work in the capacity of Owner’s Engineer to assist it in theimplementation of Part 1 of the Project.

Finance Agreement :PA - Section I.A | Description :KEL shall maintain units and departments with functions, powers, staff andresources necessary and appropriate to fulfill its responsibilities under Part 1 of the Project.
Finance Agreement :PA - Section I.C | Description :KEL shall ensure that Part 1 of the Project is carried out in accordance withthe provisions of the GAAP.
